translations: n.优势；特点；有利；[经]利益（advantage 的复数）
v.促进（advantage 的三单形式）；有利于

sentences.sentence: Military advantages should not be given away.
The advantages of the scheme far outweighed the disadvantages.
sentences.translation: 这个计划的优点远远超过了缺点。

sentences.sentence: There are many advantages to breast feeding.
